heading: HB06957
0:
AN ACT GRANTING RUP BROADCASTING NETWORK OPC A FRANCHISE
TO CONSTRUCT, OPERATE AND MAINTAIN STATIONS FOR RADIO IN LEGAZPI
CITY, ALBAY, AND IN OTHER AREAS IN THE PHILIPPINES WHERE
FREQUENCIES ARE STILL AVAILABLE FOR RADIO BROADCASTING FOR
EDUCATIONAL AND CULTURAL, AS WELL AS FOR COMMERCIAL PURPOSES”
status: Pending with the Committee on LEGISLATIVE FRANCHISES since 2020-06-04
history:
House Bill/Resolution NO. HB06957
FULL TITLE : AN ACT GRANTING RUP BROADCASTING NETWORK OPC A FRANCHISE TO CONSTRUCT, OPERATE AND MAINTAIN STATIONS FOR RADIO IN LEGAZPI CITY, ALBAY, AND IN OTHER AREAS IN THE PHILIPPINES WHERE FREQUENCIES ARE STILL AVAILABLE FOR RADIO BROADCASTING FOR EDUCATIONAL AND CULTURAL, AS WELL AS FOR COMMERCIAL PURPOSES”
PRINCIPAL AUTHOR/S : GARBIN, ALFREDO JR. A.
DATE FILED : 2020-06-04
SIGNIFICANCE: NATIONAL
ACTIONS TAKEN BY THE COMMITTEE ON RULES
